message.content: {"given_definition_quality":92,"better_definition":"to play or have fun","sentence":"他们玩儿。","image_prompt":"A group of children playing happily together outside, in a lively but soft apocalypse animation style. The environment shows slightly surreal, softened elements like overgrown grass and broken playground equipment under a gentle evening light. The children are visibly joyful and engaged in a game, wearing simple clothes and moving energetically.","sentence_translation":"They play."}
